The claim was shared on social media by: I Support Arnab Goswami" along with three pictures of the alleged illegal arms and ammunition recovered from the Madrasa in Bijnor, Uttar Pradesh.
Another user shared the same pictures on: providing further information about the incident, including the arrest of the Madrasa superintendent named Sajid and five others.
The pictures and claim were also shared: adding to the circulation and visibility of the claim.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, received multiple verification requests about the incident and conducted their own investigation. They found that Bijnor police confirmed the incident, stating that illegal arms were indeed smuggled and six people were arrested in connection with the case. The police also tweeted two of the circulating images as evidence.
